name: Tug of Warlords
description:
:
Tug of Warlords is a local multiplayer game, where you and your opponent must battle for supremacy.

Clutching onto a a mere, but surprisingly sturdy length of rope, you goal is yank the enemy player into the (bon)fires of hell!

This game was made for Ludum Dare 32 During the Ludum Dare #32: Jam.
As such, this game is bound to contain bugs and unfinished content.

Requirements:
2 x Gamepads

Controls:
Move (← & →): Left analog stick
Jump: A Button
Pull: X Button
Restart: Start button (Gamepad) or R (Keyboard)
Alt+F4: Close game

Credits:
Volatile Reaction by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
